題庫題材撰寫者，尤其是在剛開始接觸此流程時，可以使用題庫題材來啟動他們的創造力，並發展問題的想法。Haladyna 和 Shindoll (1989) 建議，使用題庫題材對新手題材撰寫者可能會有幫助。題庫題材是一個「空心」題材，包含一個結構或框架，用於透過交換某些細節來創建新的問題。
Shells Item writers, especially when new to the process, can jumpstart their creativity and develop ideas for questions by using an item shell. Haladyna and Shindoll (1989) have suggested that the use of item shells can be helpful to beginning item writers. An item shell is a “hollow” item containing a structure or framework that is used to write similar items by exchanging certain details to create a new question. An

example of an item shell format is: Which of the following is the MOST common side effect associated with long-term use of [INSERT MEDICATION]?
A.
KEY [正確的副作用] B.
KEY [correct side effect] B.

誘惑選項 [可能的副作用] 採用此題幹作為題型框架，可透過替換通常服用時間較長的另一種藥物，再創建新的答案鍵和誘惑選項，來生成多個問題。
DISTRACTOR [plausible side effect] Using this question as an item shell, this same stem could be used to create multiple questions by substituting a different medication usually taken for longer periods, and then creating a new key and distractors.
